title: Download full backup  [Mtn.co.rw]
content:
Summary:
I discovered few critical vulnerabilities here, one of them is exposed backup files via directory listing.
Steps To Reproduce:
go to https://mtn.co.rw/mtn.zip and download the file
extract the file and open
you will see the full backup of the website
Similar report:
https://hackerone.com/reports/684838
Impact
Source code & DB credentials leakage. Attacker can use it to compromise the resource.
steps: Navigate to https://mtn.co.rw/mtn.zip and download the file.
Extract the file to view the full backup of the website, including source code and DB credentials.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves exposed backup files via directory listing, leading to source code and database credentials leakage. Attackers can exploit this to compromise the resource.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires accessing a direct URL to download a backup file. There are no complex interactions or states involved.
